formal the ability, especially of a medicine or a method of achieving something, to produce the intended result: efficacity of The efficacity of the new regulations must now be examined. They were not interested in arguments about the efficacity of financial aid. Synonyms
effectiveness
efficacy
medical
  specialized how well a particular treatment or drug works under controlled scientific testing conditions: This study evaluates the efficacity and speed of action of the drug.efficacity of We will look at the comparative efficacity of malaria treatments. Synonym
efficacy
